name: Sead Servant
description:
Game was created in 72h for  LM0B  Game Jam

Full-Screen is recommended for better experience

---------------------------------------Objective------------------------------------------

Objective is pretty straight forward  yet not easy - protect the egg from aggresive fishes and try to  score as much points as possible.

Collect  powerups like a friendly jellyfish,additional health,faster movement speed or let ai take control of your character for a tiny bit to help you stay alive longer .

---------------------------------------Controls------------------------------------------

  •  Use your mouse to control the direction your character is moving
  •  Swim faster for a short period of time by holding Left Mouse Button ( LMB)

---------------------------------------Credits------------------------------------------

Art/Programming/Sound effects-  Deezaath

Original Music Theme: 

Naoya Sakamata  -"Savage Mountain"

Programs used:

  • Unity Engine
  • Audacity
  • GIMP
